links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
formula: a(n)=(1/2)*[19+17*(-1)^n]-9*[C(2*n,n) mod 2], with n>=0. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jul 24 2009a(n+1) = 18^n mod 19, for all n >= 0. - _M. F. Hasler_, Mar 10 2011
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 27000); x=contfrac(sqrt(99)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b010170.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 12 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A010550 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 12 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
